details: Developed and maintained full-stack web applications using React and Node.js
Led the implementation of microservices architecture improving system scalability
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver features on agile sprints
Optimized database queries and API responses, reducing load times by 40%
Built responsive user interfaces with React and TypeScript
Implemented state management solutions using Redux and Context API
Worked closely with UX designers to implement pixel-perfect designs
Participated in code reviews and mentored junior developers
Developed custom WordPress themes and plugins for client websites
Created responsive HTML/CSS templates from design mockups
Performed website maintenance and performance optimization
Assisted in project planning and client communication
